2023-03-08.message: what do you need me to do?
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: let's start with the vase. Put it on the round red placemat
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: ohh do you have more than one
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: cool, it is the yellow vase
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: I have a yellow one and a red one
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: put the yellow vase on the round red placemat
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: do we need the red vase?
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: yes, lets move that to the square red placemat
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: nice. If you have anything on the top dark brown placemat, put it on the table
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: cool. Let's move to the sliced apple then. Put the sliced apple on the brown placemat which is in the middle row
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: great. Let's put the blue plate on the light purple placemat
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: Now the last task, Put the sliced loaf of bread on the dark purple placemat
2023-03-08.label: put_obj_in_rcp

2023-03-08.message: I still have an empty mat is that normal?
2023-03-08.label: <label>

2023-03-08.message: yeah, Top brown mat is empty
2023-03-08.label: <label>
